title: Falling to Pieces
description: It was just a little white lie.I never thought it would spiral out of control.But I didn’t have a choice. Asher was close to learning the truth about me and I couldn’t let that happen.But now everyone hates me. Well, everyone except for Asher. He believes in me even after what I’ve done.And when I’m with him I feel like I’m falling.I just hope if I do, he’s there to catch me.
author: Amber Garza
